title: Jose A. Guevara - FullStack Developer
description: Professional portfolio of Jose A. Guevara, Junior FullStack Developer
professional_profile: I am a passionate junior full stack developer with experience in Vue.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS, Laravel, and ASP.NET. I enjoy learning and experimenting with new technologies, as well as sharing my knowledge. I specialize in building efficient, scalable, and well-designed web applications by following best practices and writing clean code. I am proactive, analytical, and highly motivated to continue growing professionally.
university: Universidad de Costa Rica (University of Costa Rica)

languages.description: Mother tongue, full proficiency in all contexts
Able to hold technical conversations, read documentation, and write professional emails

experiences.title: Backend Developer - Hospital Management Application
experiences.description: Collaborated in the development of a Java application for comprehensive hospital management, including features such as hospital listings consultation, integration of new hospitals, modification of existing records, and hospital removal.

experiences.title: FullStack Developer - Restaurant Management Application
experiences.description: As part of a team, developed an ASP.NET application to manage restaurants, including the administration of recipes, menus, and orders, focusing on optimizing user experience and operational efficiency.

experiences.title: FullStack Developer - Notion-like Checklist
experiences.description: Participated in a team that created a checklist application similar to Notion, using Vue.js for the front-end and Laravel for the back-end. The app allows users to efficiently create and manage tasks, featuring drag and drop, real-time editing, and authentication.

experiences.title: FullStack Developer - Newbie (Spotify-like Application)
experiences.description: Collaborated with a team to develop a music streaming application using React and Tailwind CSS, creating an attractive and functional user interface with features like playlists, music playback, and user customization.

projects.title: Hospital Management App
projects.description: The system includes features such as listing hospitals, adding new ones, updating existing records, and deleting hospitals.

projects.title: Restaurant Management App
projects.description: In a team, we developed an ASP.NET application to manage restaurants, including recipes, menus, and ingredients, focusing on user experience and best practices.

projects.title: Checklist like Notion
projects.description: I developed a checklist-type app using Vue.js for the frontend and Laravel for the backend. It allows users to create, edit, delete, and view tasks.

projects.title: Newbie (Spotify-like App)
projects.description: I developed an app that allows users to search artists and view albums using Spotifyâ€™s API. Users can explore various artists' music and albums.

projects.title: Eduvote (Student Voting System)
projects.description: I designed and developed a web platform where students can vote for political parties within their educational institution. It includes authentication, real-time results, and an admin system to manage elections.
